trans-unit.source: htmlArea RTE > Edit Element
The "Edit element" dialogue allows to edit the general attributes of an element in the RTE editing area.

Clicking the "Edit element" icon in the RTE tool bar opens a dialogue that allows to edit the general attributes of an element. The dialogue allows to edit the id, title, class, lang and dir attributes, as well as the microdata attributes of the element. It also allows to specify handlers for keyboard and mouse events.
EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/EditElement/skin/images/element-edit.png
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: "Edit element" icon in the editor tool bar.

xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:id, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:title, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:className, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_Language:languageCombo, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_Language:directionCombo, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_MicrodataSchema, xEXT_rtehtmlarea_EditElement:events
trans-unit.note: This string contains an internal text, which must not be changed. Just copy the original text into the translation field. For more information have a look at the Tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Id attribute
Enter or edit the value of the id attribute of the element.
Title attribute
Enter or edit the value of the title attribute of the element.
trans-unit.target: Entrez ou modifiez la valeur du titre de l'attribut de l'élément

alt-trans.target: Entrez ou modifiez la valeur du titre de l'attribut de l'element

trans-unit.source: Class attribute
Choose a CSS class selector to be assigned to the element.
trans-unit.target: Choisissez un sélecteur de classe CSS à assigner à l’élément

alt-trans.target: Choisissez un sélecteur de classe CSS à assigner à l’élément

trans-unit.source: Event handlers
Using this fieldset, edit handlers for keyboard and mouse events.
Onkeydown event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Entrer ou modifier le script à lancer quand une touche est appuyée

alt-trans.target: Entrer ou modifier le script à lancer quand une touche est appuyée

trans-unit.source: Onkeypress event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed and released.
Onkeyup event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when a key is pressed and released.
Onclick event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run on a mouse click.
Ondblclick event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run on a mouse double-click.
Onmousedown event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when a mouse button is pressed.
Onmousemove event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when the mouse pointer moves.
Onmouseout event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when mouse pointer moves out of the element.
Onmouseover event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when mouse pointer moves over the element.
Onmouseup event handler
Enter or edit the script to be run when a mouse button is released.
